case.state: This is where I'm supposed to meet them, right?
This is where I'm supposed to meet them, right?
A-Accelerator!? ...Wait a sec... Sorry, I thought you were someone else, hehe.
You're a student and a magic user? I didn't think Academy City had schools for magic.
Your outfit... Are you part of the church?
A magic user, huh...? You're not associated with the church are you?
Angel wings!? Th-that means you're from the...!
Well hello everyone, I'm Misaka!
A game of poker, huh... count me in!
Heh!? What a cute robot... reminds me of the cleaning bots in the city!
Eh!? We're playing poker outdoors? Kinda strange if you ask me...
Hey! I've never met any of you girls before! I'm Mikoto Misaka!
There's certainly a lotta guys here... What am I getting in to?
Hmmm... I'll take ~cards~ cards.
I've got this! Give me ~cards~ cards.
I think I'll go for... ~cards~ cards.
Give me ~cards~ cards, that should do it!
Heh! I don't even need to swap any cards!
They don't call me the 'Ace' for nothing!
There's no way I can lose now!
You might as well give up!
Hmm... this could go either way...
Uh... well whatever. I'm sure it'll work out.
These cards are OK. I can work something out.
Sheesh... these cards!
Give me a break... such a bad hand!
This is so annoying! What can I do with these?
I suppose it's easier for everyone if you're speaking in English.
It can't be t-too bad, right? E-everyone else seemed OK with it.
Wait a sec... I've got to strip!? What kind of game is this?
You've got to be kidding me, I gotta strip!? Fine... I don't intend on losing.
Wait a sec... I've got to strip!? What kind of game is this?
Wait a sec... I've got to strip!? What kind of game is this?
I think I'll take off my shoes to begin with.
Don't think you'll impress me with whatever you take off.
It's not like I care to see ~player~ strip down.
Ehhh!? I didn't know we were playing THAT kind of poker! So ~player~ must strip, right?
Don't think you'll impress me with whatever you take off.
It's not like I care to see ~name~ strip off.
Ehhh!? I didn't know we were playing THAT kind of poker! So ~name~ has to strip, right?
If you gotta strip, go for something light.
It's OK ~player~, just go for something small if you can.
Ehhh!? I didn't know we were playing THAT kind of poker! So ~player~ has to strip, right?
If you gotta strip, go for something light.
It's OK ~name~, just go for something small if you can.
Heh! I bet it doesn't even bother you, huh?
Ehhh!? I didn't know we were playing THAT kind of poker! So ~name~ has to strip, right?
Seriously? Your ~clothing~ barely counts!
Seriously!? Someone like you deserves to take off more.
You're seriously only gonna remove your ~clothing~? Just give it up already!
It's not like this changes anything, though.
Hey! What're you doing! That looks similar to what the Sisters do when they're... ohhh..
No big deal... it's only your ~clothing~.
Ahhh! I bet you're just as cute without your ~clothing~!
I don't recognize that uniform... are you even from Academy City?
Ehh!? Did you just burn off your ~clothing~!? Is that some kinda Esper ability?
Removing your ~clothing~!? It must be kinda important to you, huh?
I wonder what she'll remove next?
Woah!? ~name~, are you okay? That's a serious hit you took!
Going for the small stuff...good. I'm fine with that.
Heh! You totally deserve that!
Okay then, let's keep going!
Ah, your ~clothing~... I see how it is.
You're still gonna look cute either way!
I don't recognize that uniform... are you even from Academy City?
Ehh!? I think I can see ~name~'s... parts ... through her pants!
W-wait!? You were a zombie this entire time!? ...Saten was right, they do exist!
Hey, don't sweat it! Let's keep going!
Seriously!? You coulda removed the entire thing...
Ohhh... I see why she didn't wanna take off her gloves.
W-wait!? You're removing your ~clothing~!?
Hehe! Karma's finally caught up with you!
Whaa!? ~name~? Removing your ~clothing~!? Seriously!?
I really hope you're not gonna go further than that!
Well... we are on the beach after all.
You seriously think I'd wanna join you in the hot springs, ~name~!
Ehh...!? Is she really gonna remove her ~clothing~!?
Ohhh! I bet you're wearing cute underwear, too!
I don't recognize that uniform... are you even from Academy City?
H-hey! Watch where you're firing that thing!
Whaa!? ~name~? You're taking of your ~clothing~ so soon!?
This was a common site in the girl's dorm showers, no big deal.
~name~, It's kinda cool actually!
Waaah!? Weren't you just... I don't recall this ability in the ACD.
Ohhh!? Hey, ~name~, it's okay. I can get why you'd wanna hide them from other people.
Whaa!? You're thong isn't... well.... I can kinda see your hair down there!
We are on the beach... may as well dress for it, right!
Looks to me like you aren't even trying!
Even though you're a guy, a bare chest is still...
~name~, are you just tryin' to show off!?
Eehh!? Th-that's kinda weird! I'm just not use to seeing someone without any nipples! N-not that I was looking!
Ehh...!? You're seriously gonna remove that?
I wasn't expecting... that. Is it supposed to be so... small?
Uhh... I don't know if I should even be looking.
Whaa..!? I didn't think that they could be so... big.
